body:
#### PR description:
Two modification are added, which should not affect any existing WF, but are useful for interface with future developments.

1)  Updated method of gdml geometry dump, which now includes full information on sensitive detectors. This is needed for Phase2 and GPU R&D

2) Change code of ExceptionHandler, which now do the same actions but do not rely on the list of Geant4 exception types.

this PR addressed issues in cmsdist cms-sw/cmsdist#8741 and cms-sw/cmsdist#8742
